/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a vibrant street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with lush green trees, providing a canopy of shade and adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Cars parked along the side of the road hint at the bustling activity of the city. People can be seen walking on the sidewalk, going about their day, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a sunny day. The image is bathed in natural daylight, enhancing the colors and details of the scene.
